subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Nikolay Davydenko and Tommy Robredo, the top two seeds in the men’s draw at the Pilot Pen in New Haven, were eliminated in straight sets yesterday in the third round.And in the women’s draw, a qualifier advanced to the semifinals when Agnes Szavay defeated eighth-seeded Alona Bondarenko, 6-1, 6-4.Davydenko, the defending champion, lost to Gilles Simon, 6-4, 6-4. Robredo fell to Stanislas Wawrinka, 6-3, 6-3. Igor Andreev beat fourth-seeded David Ferrer, 3-6, 7-6 (3), 6-4.James Blake, seeded third, won, 3-6, 7-6 (2), 6-1, after being down three match points to Agustin Calleri.
